meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Steve Stone Sibel Oyman Chuck Champagne Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4382.

div.div: Game data retrieved from an alternate archive.

td.p: Steve Stone, a business manager from North Wildwood, New Jersey
Sibel Oyman, a research assistant from Washington, D.C.
Chuck Champagne, a vice president of finance from Cumberland, Rhode Island (whose 2-day cash winnings total $34,402)

tr.td: ORGANIC CHEMISTRY
MOVIE SEQUELS
FURNITURE
EUROPEAN PEAKS
MARSHMALLOW MADNESS
MISSING VOWELS

tr.td: Joseph Lister pioneered antiseptic medicine with the carbolic type of this, today called phenol
